T02D2187:58a-2: rdo rje lce dbab pa'i sngags ni /
T02D2187:58a-7: tsi tra mu tra yaksha tra bzlog byer /
T02D2187:58a-8: n'a ga shig n'a ga byer /
T02D2187:58a-11: n'a ga ha na ha na n'a ra ya rbad nam /
T02D2187:58a-13: tshon skud rnam lnga la sngags mdud byas pa dang /
T02D2187:58a-14: gla rtsi dang seng ldeng gi phur pa la sngags bzlas la bsrung ngo //
T02D2187:58a-27: sa 'di srungs shig byer ya bya'o //
T02D2187:58b-2: che ge mo m'a ra ya rbad nam /
T02D2187:58b-3: n'a ga hri la hri la /
T02D2187:58b-6: phur pa dang tshil chen dang /
T02D2187:58b-7: khyi dang bong bu dang rta rnams ku nag po'i khrag dang /
T02D2187:58b-8: thod pa mtshan ngan cig dang /
T02D2187:58b-15: rten sa ru sbra phub la gzungs gdon /
T02D2187:58b-22: ae: ba ga: ra tshe 'di na ba ga: bar ma /
T02D2187:58b-25: bar ma h'a aa: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2187:58b-26: zhes ci mang du bzlas so //
T02D2187:58b-27: rang phyag na rdo rje bsgom shes na rab /
T02D2187:58b-29: mang du bzlas na gang yang rung ba thub bo //
T02D2187:58b-30: phyag na rdo rje klu 'dul ba'i drag sngags bsgom du med pa'o //
T02D2187:58b-31: the tshom yid gnyis rkyen gyi rgyu bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa zab mo rdzogs so /
T02D2187:58b-33: // / de yang bya ba'i dus ni /
T02D2187:58b-37: mnan pa la sogs gzhan dang mthun /
T02D2187:58b-38: sbyin sreg gi rim pa la /
T02D2187:58b-39: rdzas ni zhi rgyas gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2187:58b-40: gdug pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs dang /
T02D2187:58b-41: mar nag tshil chen ske tshe dang //
T02D2187:58b-42: til dang ming byang spel te bsreg / sla ba'am thab khung rnying pa ru //
T02D2187:58b-43: brgya'am yang na lnga bzhi gcig / bskyar zhing las la sbyar bya ba dang //
T02D2187:58b-44: sngags kyi mthar ni raksha sh'antim gdags par bya //
T02D2187:58b-45: spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa ni //
T02D2187:58b-46: gzhan yang dkyus las shes par bya //
T02D2187:58b-47: nyam chung snod med the tshom rang 'phung 'gyur //
T02D2187:58b-48: nyams ldan ma yengs bsgrubs byas nas //
T02D2187:58b-49: bla ma dam pa rnams kyi zhabs la gtugs /
T02D2187:58b-52: zhar la 'di yang mchod pa ste //
T02D2187:58b-53: 'khar sogs snod ni mdzes pa ru //
T02D2187:58b-54: 'o ma dang bcas sman rnams kyis //
T02D2187:58b-55: bkang ste mdun du bzhag pa'o ;
T02D2187:58b-56: / de steng bzhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02D2187:58b-57: shin tu gsal byed gdan stengs su //
T02D2187:58b-58: lnga ldan mtha' yas sbrul dgu pa //
T02D2187:58b-59: rtsi sman mchod cing mdun gnas pa'o //
T02D2187:58b-60: bsreg mnan bskyal ba nyams dang sbyar //
T02D2187:58b-61: bdag rnal 'byor pa sdang mig gis lta zhing /
T02D2187:59a-4: de nas thal mo brdab cing nad dang gdon bgegs thams cad brlag par bsam mo //
T02D2187:59a-5: yang yang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te gong gi mi la bstim mo //
T02D2187:59a-6: de nas phur pa gdab cing brub par bya'o //
T02D2187:59a-7: aa ti ae'i tshogs kyi rim pa la /
T02D2187:59a-8: dang po bdag rnal 'byor ba'i mdun du mdzub gang ba'i brub khung gru gsum brus te /
T02D2187:59a-9: de'i nang du ming byang bu la bris la gzhag
T02D2187:59a-10: / de'i kha ru g-yam pa sngon po cig la
T02D2187:59a-11: yung ba ser pos ri rab dang rdo rje rgya
T02D2187:59a-12: gram gyi gzugs bris la bzhag / ma grub byas
T02D2187:59a-14: kun la yod na ngo mtshar chung //
T02D2187:59a-15: lce dbab pa'i bya thabs rdzogs so /
T02D2187:59a-17: // / rten 'brel gyi mthus bsrung ba'i thabs ni /
T02D2187:59a-20: sa'i bdud rtsi lo lnga ba rgya lon pa yan chod bsku'o //
T02D2187:59a-21: spos gu gul nag po dang /
T02D2187:59a-25: dri chen dang cha mnyam du sbyar te /
T02D2187:59a-26: sbrang rtsis sbrus te dud pa btang ngo //
T02D2187:59a-27: sman gyi nus pa ni 'bras bu gsum dang /
T02D2187:59a-28: bus pa skyes ma thag pa'i rang 'byung dang bsres te /
T02D2187:59a-29: dri chus sbrus pa'i ri lu khar gzhag go //
T02D2187:59a-30: sman gyi mchog gis bsrung ba ni /
T02D2187:59a-31: aa ru ra rnam par rgyal ba bcangs pas bsrung ba'o //
T02D2187:59a-32: sa bdag gi nad thub bo /
T02D2187:59a-34: // / nyi ma sa bla na la sogs pa la 'di gdags so //
T02D2187:59a-37: ha na ha na m'a ra ya rbad nan /
T02D2187:59a-38: zhes bzlas shing bsrung ba bya'o //
